subject: Missing Order
description_text:
Hello,
My name is Kevin Graziose. I ordered a set of your black plus x 3 set
pedals back in November 28 via Amazon through your storefront. They were
shipped via fedex and were supposed to arrive December 9. Tracking hasn’t
moved since Monday December 8 and fedex has no location of the package.
Should I be in contact with them or you about trying to get a replacement
set? I can provide the tracking number if you need it. Would you also
recommend I just purchase the replacement via your website?

Thank you,
Kevin

conversations.body_text: Hi Kevin Graziose,  Could you please provide us with your order number? We will check it.

Thankfully they arrived the next day. I am however a bit confused. I made a
separate purchase for the h pattern shifter also via Amazon and it shipped
from china but your product images said it ships in the USA. Do you
typically see long shipping times for those? The tracking number for that
one is:
SF6047154991597

On Sat, Dec 13, 2025 at 1:56 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Kevin Graziose,  This may be due to the fact that the goods in the US warehouse are sold out and can only be shipped from the Chinese warehouse.   the shipping carrier is SF Express, you can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill
